name: Freddie Dredd Freddie's Dead
description: Freddie Dredd Freddie's Dead, a Trippy Endless Marathon of Addictive Retro Gaming. @FreddieDredd & @Rapsmyinitials bring to you classic gaming with a twist of mixtape. Simply project & bounce your way through colorful music bars to increase your score, by tapping anywhere on the screen to bounce, keep multi tapping( think like basketball dribbling) for extra hang time & air time. Time your jumps, & taps to miss all enemy skulls! . High scores, will unlock additional music & bonus player skins! Compete worldwide with the Game Center leaderboard & gain all the Game Center Achievements. Find the easter eggs.
